title: Sooners Sweep Texas Tech in Big 12 Quarterfinal - University of Oklahoma - Soonersports.com
content: Sooners Sweep Texas Tech in Big 12 Quarterfinal - University of Oklahoma  Soonersports.com
description: FORT WORTH, Texas â€” The No. 5-seed Oklahoma men's tennis team swept the No. 4-seed Texas Tech Red Raiders 4-0 in the quarterfinal of the 2022 Big 12 Men's Tennis Championship at the Bayard H. Friedman Tennis Center, Friday afternoon.
